hasVariant.description: Buy the Columbia Payton Pass II Insulated Jacket - Women's online or shop all Clothing from Backcountry.com.

review.itemreviewed: Payton Pass II Insulated Jacket - Women's
review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is exactly what I was looking for in a coat - keeps you warm, and is waterproof, and looks cute! I got the Medium and it fits well, even with a sweater on underneath. Plenty of pockets (love that the pockets are fleece lined!) and the zippers on the side are a great touch.
review.name: Simply Perfect Coat for rainy winters

review.itemreviewed: Payton Pass II Insulated Jacket - Women's
review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great jacket, very warm but not too bulky. Would recommend for any activity levels. The fit is good except the armpit area is tight. I normally wear a small and ordered a medium instead based on other reviews.  Medium fits nicely
review.name: Great jacket, warm but not bulky

review.itemreviewed: Payton Pass II Insulated Jacket - Women's
review.reviewBody:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a very well-made jacket, and it is very warm. This is the jacket that you would want to wear in a very bad storm. It’s also very lightweight for something that is so warm. However, this is not for 40 or 50° weather, it would be too warm for that. this is for the blizzard, the very cold. The length is just perfect, and it covers the seat completely. It’s very adjustable, with tons of pockets. It’s waterproof too. 
This is a good blizzard Parka. 🥶
I would say that it runs true to size.
review.name: Good blizzard jacket

review.itemreviewed: Payton Pass II Insulated Jacket - Women's
review.reviewBody: The cold cuts right through this coat.  Maybe it’ll work for someone in Florida
review.name: No good

review.itemreviewed: Payton Pass II Insulated Jacket - Women's
review.reviewBody:
I am normally a medium and 1st got the medium. This coat is for Western Alaska. fit was too small (tight) in arms. I wouldn't have been able to appropriately layer in this size. Returned for an XL and it is working well. I like the overall style and cut, and is well made.
Negative for me is the flashy gold color on inside of jacket. Could easily live without that. Minus 1 star only for that. Around the neck is cold spot, but easy to deal with.
review.name: Stylish and Warm

review.itemreviewed: Payton Pass II Insulated Jacket - Women's
review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Excellent quality and functionality. In addition, it is quite light and warm at the same time. I would really like to keep this jacket, but unfortunately it is very narrow in the armpits even in a T-shirt. If you wear a light sweater it will be completely uncomfortable. I will try to order a size up
review.name: Great, but narrow in the armpits

name: Payton Pass II Insulated Jacket - Women's

description: Buy the Black Diamond Stinger Crampon online or shop all Climb from Backcountry.com.

hasVariant.name: Stinger Crampon
hasVariant.description: Buy the Black Diamond Stinger Crampon online or shop all Climb from Backcountry.com.

review.reviewBody: I used those crampons in Patagonia, Peru are really goods
review.name: Nice alpine crampons

review.reviewBody: Been ice climbing with these in ouray and lake city, Colorado. Using them with 2023 scarpa phantom techs - easy mount dismount, no heal pinching.
review.name: Solid, sturdy

review.reviewBody: I got these from a recommendation from a buddy and they do not disappoint. Shopping was super fast!🤙
review.name: Love it!

review.reviewBody: I’ve borrowed these crampons from friends in the past as well as other crampons and I have liked these the most so I finally pulled the trigger. Super easy to adjust, mono point is the way to go for me and pretty durable. Can’t wait to get these out on some more ice!
review.name: Stoked!

review.reviewBody: I just upgraded my crampons to the singers and love them!!
review.name: Great Crampons

review.reviewBody: Wore out my last pair guiding, can only sharpen them so many times! (yes the bottom points lol) Only issue I ever had was the front bail snapped...while leading *yikes* Cheaper plated metal, not stainless steel like the good ol' days. Please consider fixing this on future models. That said they are a fantastic crampon!
review.name: Someone is getting stung!

review.reviewBody: Got the email that the stingers were back in stock last week and ran to the outfitter to grab my pair! Can’t wait for this season! Like all BD crampons they are solid! Never used monos before and can’t with to see if the hype is real!
review.name: Stingers!

review.reviewBody:
I used to climb a lot some 20+ years ago and decided to get back into it. The ease of use and the holding power of the mono point is impressive on the brittle glacier fronts that I have worked on in the last few weeks.

I'm very happy with this purchase.
One mishap after three days of using: the stainless retainer clip that keeps the length of the crampon to your needs did somehow bend open a bit and it wouldn't stay to what you set it to. I needed some special tools to get in the clip to bend it back.
review.name: Back into ice climbing

review.reviewBody: Had been climbing in the blade runners, but couldn’t find replacement front points, so ordered some Stingers. They climb great, easy to set the fit and and didn’t ball snow while walking around. Like all BD gear, super solid piece of equipment.
review.name: Climb Great

review.reviewBody: A upgrade from Sabertooths. Even with the loss of a second front-point, my feet feel more secure in these on all ice that I've climbed. Can't say I've felt the same mixed climbing in these, however.
review.name: Great ice crampon!

name: Stinger Crampon

description: Buy the Mammut Cargon 40-140L Duffel online or shop all Accessories from Backcountry.com.

hasVariant.name: Cargon 40-140L Duffel
hasVariant.description: Buy the Mammut Cargon 40-140L Duffel online or shop all Accessories from Backcountry.com.

review.reviewBody: Great bag. Seems like it will last a long time.
review.name: Well made duffle

review.reviewBody: My wife and I each have the Cargon 40L and we each brought ours on our honeymoon to Ireland, Italy, and Greece. The bags held up incredibly well during the 2 weeks traveling across Europe and they were very comfortable to carry in both the backpack and carry handle configuration. The bag has a ton of storage and the open compartment without smaller dividers was much more usable as it didn’t limit us in what our usable space was. We plan on buying more in a variety of larger sizes as well for camping, hiking, and ski trips. Cannot recommend this bag enough! Another great product from Mammut.
review.name: Great Carry-on Size and Amazing Quality

review.reviewBody: I love this duffel bag. It’s really high quality and durable, and it has plenty of room for all of your gear. I also like that it’s so lightweight, as sometimes on longer trips I get dangerously close to my bag being over 50 lbs and having to pay the airline lots of extra money. The other duffels I considered weighed a lot more, and I was worried that would tip me over the 50 lb mark. This bag is super light yet still has a lot of pockets and good compression, and the backpack straps make it easy to haul through the airport. Highly recommend this bag.
review.name: Great Duffle Bag

review.reviewBody: I like this bag as a carryon because you can stuff it full since it is just an open sack.  No wheels, dividers or other internal parts taking up space.  I noticed a significant amount more of packable space versus my standard wheeled carry on.
review.name: Great Carry on bag

review.reviewBody: I love a backpack duffel! This bag has plenty of space to pack for a week-long trip and function as a carry-on. It could use some more interior pockets for organization, but otherwise, it functions exactly as advertised. The durable coating on the bottom makes it extra rugged and the bright color makes it easy to find. Love this bag!
Poches bien plac√©es et mat√©riel tenace. Un tr√®s bon choix polyvalent
review.name: Solide et pratique

review.reviewBody: The optimal city-to-nature partner. I use this bag as a weekender, a gym bag, and even to go to work. It is comfortable for short walks even with over 10 lbs of stuff. The two internal pockets are quite useful too. Worth the investment!
I mean a it's a duffel. Keeps stuff dry from spot to spot in the snow and rain. I few more inside pockets with zippers would be cool but not a huge deal.
review.name: Great duffel

review.reviewBody: Everything you want in a duffel bag. Super durable with plenty of internal pockets. The backpack straps are great for transportation.

This is so well made that I don't think it will rip or fall apart at the seams. I purchased it to hold my daily ski gear, extra clothing and light spare parts/tools, snacks. The 90 liter works really well for this purpose. I've been wanting to replace my action packer ski box with some sort of soft bag/duffel and did quite a bit of research on the different brands' offerings. I'm glad I chose this one. I'll use it for travel as well because the integrated shoulder straps work quite well, even when you just put the straps over one shoulder. This is a really good design and great materials.
review.name: Great daily ski bag

name: Cargon 40-140L Duffel

review.reviewBody: GU Liquid Energy has been a game-changer for my runs over 5 miles. The caffeine version provides an effective energy boost, helping me maintain my pace and stamina. It is easy to carry and consume on the go, and the taste is pleasant without being overly sweet. Additionally, it is gentle on the stomach, making it ideal for long-distance running. GU Liquid Energy has become essential for my long runs, and I highly recommend it.
review.name: great for my longer runs

review.reviewBody: and I've had a LOT! These are so refreshing, and having a pleasing mouthfeel. I even keep the wrappers, break them open at home and will finish every last drop haha! They're all good, but the strawberry banana is like having a smoothie. It's so good!
review.name: BEST GELS I'VE EVER HAD

review.reviewBody:
But in a good way! I think thats probably all this is is a regular GU packet with the appropriate amount of water already mixed into it, but its perfect. I love being able to take one of these with me and not have to take any water to get it down and working. Within a few minutes of taking one I can feel it working which is not something I can say about regular GU in my past experiences, because i probably wasnt taking enough water, problem solved. They are larger than a normal GU due to the extra volume but still fits in a pocket just fine

I wish there were more flavor options, but after trying them all via the sample pack, my flavor rankings in order of greatness are the Strawberry Banana (SO GOOD), Lemonade, Orange, and Coffee (not so good). I will be repurchasing a full pack of the Strawberry Banana for sure. 

4 stars because its kind of pricey for what it is compared to regular GUs, and because they are kind of a pain to get open to the point where they are easy to slam, and because as good as they are they still have that classic GU aftertaste and burps.
review.name: Watery Gu..

review.reviewBody: I use a lot of nutrition products and have found that the only time I have real issues is during hot weather. I am more sensitive to taste and texture which can prevent me from using the correct amount of nutrition to keep me going. I have found that the texture and taste of GU's liquid gels has really filled this gap where I have had the miss and is now a key a key part of my nutrition program.
review.name: Favorite hot weather nutrition

name: Liquid Energy - 12-Pack

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It's very lightweight and easy to use. No problems.
review.name: Ultra-Sil Stuff Sack

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I purchased a small lightweight bag to replace my worn out existing bag which stores my cook set on my backpacking trips. Not only is it perfectly sized for my needs but the bag has a tab on it near the closure so that I can slip a carabineer on it and hang it with my food bag. Bonus!
review.name: Lightweight and perfect size

review.reviewBody: I got about a dozen of these and will probably be getting more. I use them for everything and they are amazing. If you don’t need compression, they are super slick so they go in and out of the pack easy. I’ve been pushing them hard, and they seem super durable. They’re Extremely lightweight
review.name: Can’t live without them

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I use some variety or size of ultra-sil sacs every day, often multiple varieties and sizes. Smaller ones organize belongings in purse or backpack. Larger ones keep my boat gear handy and dry. I carry shopping bag types in my purse, and when traveling, and of course backpacking and biking use both large and small ones to organize and separate gear. Perfect for many uses, lightweight, and waterproof. I’ve even carried water in them like a pail when camping.
review.name: Can’t be beat!

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have many of the sizes. Instead of a pack liner I use several of these. Weighs about as much as a pack cover with great organization.
review.name: Dry bags keep stuff dry…..

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Keep your gear separated, organized, and stuffed inside your pack. Small is perfect for clothes, XS is perfect size for a single puffy.
review.name: Keep your gear separated, organized,

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I needed a laundry bag for an overseas trip and weight "was" an issue so I looked into lightweight stuff sacks and found the Ultra-Sil Stuff Sack. So happy I did because it was "perfect". I trusted the sack with blind faith and it did not disappoint. Now, I just want more if these Ultra-Sil Stuff Sacks!
review.name: Ultra-Sil Stuff Sack (just starting)

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These are great stuff sacks. Super light weight and water resistant. I use different sizes and different colors to sort and easily find my gear.
review.name: Lightweight and functional

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great product for hiking & backpacking. Lightweight & strong with lots of colors and sizes to help organize gear.
review.name: Great Product

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Super light weight, range of handy sizes, high quality construction. I know I will use them alot.
review.name: Go To For All Sorts of Gear!

name: Ultra-Sil 1.5L Stuff Sack

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This jacket is fantastic. I love marmot for the quality and good design, deep pockets and durability. Bonus that this jacket is super cute too and so very WARM. Thanks, Marmot!
review.name: WARM and well DESIGNED

review.reviewBody:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Accurate size and fit. Marmot never disappoints. Quality and long lasting products seem to be very important to marmot.
This jacket is warm enough for those cold days or even in between days.
For me the attached hood is convenient and useful
review.name: Marmot never disappoints

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love the Featherless hoody! attractive, comfortable, super well made, totally functional, does the job.
review.name: Great featherless hoody

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Very light yet warm, true to size, very well made, I like the zippered pockets, big enough for keys , wallet and cell phone and keep it secured
review.name: Very good quality jacket

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It is a well made jacket and we love the color too. But the fit of shoulder is strange. My daughter is 12 and lean, and she couldn’t lift her arms completely in the jacket. We had to send it back.
review.name: Strange shoulder fit
comment: Hi, thank you for posting your review. We are sorry to hear that our product is not as you expected. We're committed to making sure to turn your experience around to a rather delightful one. If you require our assistance, please contact us using our Contact Us form on the following website: https://www.marmot.com/support/contact-us or through LiveChat so we can help you further. We’re available Mon.-Fri. 9AM - 5PM EST. Thank you!

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Comfy, warm, and love the hood which fits over my beanie! Thanks for all the eco standards in this coat! The color is super fun, too.
review.name: A really great deal!

review.reviewBody: My daughter loved the color but the fit was uncomfortable as she could barely lift her arms. She is tall and slim but it seemed as though there wasn't enough fabric in the shoulders and upper back for her to raise her arms more than a T-Rex range of motion. We kept it but ordered another Marmot jacket for her which fit perfectly.
review.name: Beautiful color, poor range of motion
comment:
Hello,
Thank you for providing us with feedback on the jacket.

We are very sorry to hear that the item did not fit properly.

We will make sure to forward your idea and feedback to an appropriate department, so that we may think about upgrading the design in our future collections. Thank you so much for sharing your opinion with us.

If you have any more questions, please reach out to us via [URL-https://www.marmot.com/support/contact-us] or through LiveChat. We’re available Mon.-Fri. 9am-5pm Eastern Time.
Thank you! Marmot Consumer Care

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this jacket.  It's soft to the touch, lightweight, and very warm.  I love that it is made from recycled material and is featherless.  I am a small, which is what I purchased, and the fit is perfect.
review.name: Great Jacket

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Fit is great, color is great. Very flattering as far a puffies go. The warmth isn't quite as warm as my other puffy coats, so I'll have to layer up.
review.name: Flattering fit in a great color

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great coat! Light weight and warm enough for most cold days. And no chance of down leaking. Love the color that sets it apart from most black puffy jackets on the Jones.
review.name: Love it!

name: Echo Featherless Hoodie - Women's

review.reviewBody: Love the look and feel of this material.  Breathes and looks great runs large though I have a POC L/S XL that fights tight and this runs loose.  I’m 6-2 and 170# L would fit truer but I’m ok with the baggy fit.  Might be annoying at high speeds.  Blue is darker in person than online.  Great shirt!
review.name: Unique Shirt!

review.reviewBody:
The mesh breathes extremely well to wick sweat away and seems decently durable. 

I never say this about any article of clothing but the fit is perfect for me. Perfect! Love it
review.name: Perfect for cycling.
